item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded:
Unraveling the Wonders of the World

Welcome to Horizon Explorer, where the world is not just a destination, but an invitation to explore, discover, and connect. Founded with a relentless passion for wanderlust and a commitment to creating transformative travel experiences, Horizon Explorer is more than just a travel agency—it's a gateway to the extraordinary.

At Horizon Explorer, we believe that travel is not just about crossing places off a bucket list; it's about immersing yourself in the richness of cultures, landscapes, and moments that define our world. With each journey we craft, we strive to awaken the spirit of adventure within every traveler, igniting a sense of wonder and curiosity that transcends borders and boundaries.

Our team is comprised of seasoned travelers, explorers, and storytellers who share a collective vision: to inspire and empower individuals to embark on unforgettable journeys that leave a lasting impact on their lives. From the moment you step into our office, you're not just a client; you're part of our Horizon Explorer family, and your journey becomes our shared adventure.

What sets Horizon Explorer apart is our unwavering commitment to personalized service, attention to detail, and a dedication to sustainability and responsible tourism. We believe in creating experiences that not only leave a positive footprint on the places we visit but also foster meaningful connections with local communities and environments.

Whether you're seeking the thrill of trekking through remote wilderness, the serenity of basking on sun-drenched shores, or the cultural immersion of exploring vibrant cities, we curate bespoke itineraries tailored to your passions, interests, and dreams. From off-the-beaten-path excursions to luxury escapes, we ensure that every aspect of your journey exceeds expectations.

But beyond crafting extraordinary adventures, Horizon Explorer is driven by a deeper purpose: to inspire a sense of wonder, foster empathy and understanding, and cultivate a profound appreciation for the diversity and beauty of our world. Through travel, we bridge divides, shatter stereotypes, and celebrate the universal language of humanity.

Join us as we embark on a journey beyond the horizon, where each sunrise promises new possibilities, each sunset whispers tales of adventure, and every step leads us closer to the heart of discovery. Welcome to Horizon Explorer—where the world awaits, and the adventure begins.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/wordpress.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded:
ENJOY The best destinations with our travel agency

Explore every horizon of The World

Contact us

Discover New Horizons

Horizon Explorer is committed to bringing our clients the best in value and quality travel arrangements. We are passionate about travel and sharing the worlds wonders with you.

Get in Touch
Read More

8

European awards

500+

Happy Travelers

52

Team Members

MOST POPULAR DESTINATIONS

Chichen Itzá

Bali

Paris

View more destinations here

Our Services

Personalized Matching

Our unique matching system lets you find just the tour you want for your next holiday.

Wide Variety of Tours

We offer a wide variety of personally picked tours with destinations all over the globe.

Highly Qualified Services

Our tour managers are qualified, skilled, and friendly to bring you the best service.

24/7 Support

You can always get professional support from our staff 24/7 and ask any question you have.

Handpicked Hotels

Our team offers only the best selection of affordable and luxury hotels to our clients.

Best Price Guarantee

If you find tours that are cheaper than ours, we will compensate the difference.

What People Say

Just wanted to say many, many thanks for helping me set up an amazing Costa Rican adventure! My nephew and I had a great time! All of the accommodations were perfect, thank you!

Rupert Wood

I wanted to thank you very much for planning the trip to France for my sister and me. It was amazing and exceeded my expectations! We had a wonderful time and were very pleased.

Catherine Williams

We had a marvelous time in our travels to Madagascar, Zimbabwe, and Botswana, we had just wonderful experiences. Your service was amazing and everyone was very attentive!

Sam Peterson
item.excerpt:encoded: Displays your site's homepage, whether it is set to display latest posts or a static page. The Front Page template takes precedence over all templates.

item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded: [contact-form-7 id="f74ba17" title="Contact form 1"]

item.title: Destinations
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded:
Explore the world most captivating destinations

Set forth on a global adventure with Horizon Explorer, where each destination promises a tapestry of experiences and wonders waiting to be uncovered. Our travel agency is dedicated to crafting immersive journeys to some of the world's most renowned and enchanting locations. Here's a glimpse into the array of breathtaking destinations we offer:

  1. The Grand Canyon, USA: Behold the breathtaking majesty of the Grand Canyon, a natural wonder carved by the Colorado River over millions of years. Marvel at the canyon's vastness, vibrant colors, and stunning geological formations.
  2. The Great Barrier Reef, Australia: Dive into the vibrant underwater world of the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system. Explore its kaleidoscope of marine life, from dazzling corals to exotic fish and graceful sea turtles.
  3. Venice, Italy: Navigate the enchanting waterways of Venice, a city of timeless beauty and romance. Glide along the Grand Canal in a gondola, wander through labyrinthine streets, and marvel at architectural treasures such as St. Mark's Basilica and the Rialto Bridge.
  4. The Serengeti, Tanzania: Embark on an epic safari adventure in the Serengeti, home to Africa's most iconic wildlife. Witness the annual migration of wildebeest and zebras, and encounter lions, elephants, and leopards against the backdrop of sweeping savannah plains.
  5. The Great Wall of China: Stand in awe of the monumental Great Wall of China, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that spans thousands of miles across rugged landscapes. Walk along its ancient ramparts and soak in panoramic views of the surrounding countryside.
  6. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil: Surrender to the rhythm of samba in Rio de Janeiro, a city pulsating with energy and passion. Marvel at the iconic Christ the Redeemer statue, relax on the golden sands of Copacabana Beach, and ascend Sugarloaf Mountain for breathtaking vistas.
  7. Taj Mahal, India: Be transported to a realm of timeless beauty at the Taj Mahal, India's most iconic monument to love. Explore its exquisite marble architecture, stroll through lush gardens, and witness the ethereal beauty of the monument at sunrise or sunset.
  8. Banff National Park, Canada: Discover the pristine wilderness of Banff National Park, nestled in the heart of the Canadian Rockies. Trek through rugged mountain trails, encounter cascading waterfalls, and marvel at turquoise glacial lakes such as Lake Louise and Moraine Lake.
  9. Marrakech, Morocco: Lose yourself in the vibrant souks and hidden alleyways of Marrakech, a city steeped in history and mystique. Explore the bustling Jemaa el-Fnaa square, admire the intricate beauty of Moroccan architecture, and savor the exotic flavors of traditional cuisine.
  10. The Great Pyramids of Giza, Egypt: Stand in awe before the ancient wonders of the world at the Great Pyramids of Giza. Explore the majestic pyramids, mysterious Sphinx, and ancient tombs that have captivated travelers for millennia.

With Horizon Explorer, your journey to these extraordinary destinations is just the beginning of a lifetime of unforgettable experiences and cherished memories. Let us be your guide as you traverse the globe and discover the wonders that await.

Contact us to personalize your trip

item.title: Our services
item.dc:creator: figlesias
item.content:encoded:
At our travel agency, we are committed to making your travel dreams a reality. Explore the world with confidence, knowing that our dedicated team is here to assist you every step of the way. Here are the services we offer to ensure your journey is nothing short of extraordinary:

Tailored Itineraries

Personalized travel plans designed to match your unique preferences and interests.

24/7 Customer Support

Round-the-clock availability of our dedicated support team to address any inquiries, concerns, or emergencies throughout your journey.

Flight and Accommodation Booking

Seamless arrangements for flights and accommodations, ensuring a smooth and convenient travel experience.

Transportation Logistics

Organized transportation options, including transfers and rental cars, for effortless navigation during your trip.

Excursions and Activities

Curated experiences and adventures tailored to enrich your travel experience and create unforgettable memories.

Travel Insurance

Comprehensive insurance coverage options to offer peace of mind and assistance in case of unexpected events.

Click here to contact us and know all of our services
